text: Hi all, sorry for double posting in different channel but I am not sure what is the right one. I am working on a large redesign project. Some of my client pages were created using a starter template. As such there is no option to swap template for that page. Is the only option to manually recreate the page?

Hi Our client wanted to be able to have a private section on a page so we configured our template to have two dnd areas one for public content one for private content.
The second dnd area has
```{% if request_contact.is_logged_in %}```
Wrapping it unfortunately using this method we cannot then drag anything into the second area as the editor obeys the logged in state as well
Ueah the plan for now for the blog posts is to make multiple custom modules, where the client can edit and enter images, videos etc
Thats the only way I found out
